class_f_03_dragon_01: Hello, class! It is I, Hassel, yet again.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_03_dragon_02:
I’ve been told that my previous lecture about
the Terastal phenomenon was very well received.\r
Thank you all for your kind words![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_03_dragon_03:
In fact, Ms. Dendra specifically requested that
I impart even more battle knowledge to\r
my students...[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_03_dragon_04:
So, I have decided that today we will take
another look at how a Pokémon can Terastallize![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_03_dragon_05: And of course, here is Professor Gible to help us.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_03_dragon_06:
Now then, Professor Gible. If you would be so
kind as to Terastallize for us...[VAR 0114(0012)]

Grass-type Terastallizing, but this time we have\r
something of a different shape.[VAR 0114(0012)]

Its dendritic shape is stunning to behold.[VAR 0114(0012)]
